edu.fgcu.secrel

Class Service.ReferenceMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.fgcu.secrel.Service.ReferenceMonitor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable
    Enclosing class:
    Service

    public class Service.ReferenceMonitor
extends Object
implements Runnable
    This class is responsible for granting or denying access to a request to invoke a Service.
    Author:
    lngibson

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int AUTHORIZED
      Signifies that the monitor has granted access.
      static int IDLE
      Signifies that the monitor has not started.
      static int PENDING
      Signifies that the monitor is deliberating.
      static int UNAUTHORIZED
      Signifies that the monitor has denied access.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void authorizeUser()
      Grants access to the user.
      boolean checkRights()
      Determines if the user can invoke the Service.
      int getId()
      Returns the id of this monitor.
      int getState()
      Returns the state of this monitor.
      Thread getThread()
      Returns the thread executing this monitor.
      int getUserId()
      Returns the id of the requesting user.
      boolean isAuthorized()
      Returns whether the requesting user has been granted access.
      void run()

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
